headline: BXP to Present at the 2025 Citi Global Property CEO Conference
summary: BOSTON, February 24, 2025--BXP, Inc. (NYSE: BXP), the largest publicly traded developer, owner, and manager of premier workplaces in the United States, announced today that Owen Thomas – Chairman & Chief Executive Officer, Doug Linde – President and Mike LaBelle – Chief Financial Officer, will participate in a roundtable discussion at the 2025 Citi Global Property CEO Conference, which will be held at the Diplomat Resort & Spa from March 2-5, 2025, in Hollywood, Florida.
